body_html:
I meant:

you can specify exactly what variables to warm-start, and include the accumulators and moving stats explicitly

So I think that you can have a new parameter to recover accumulators and moving stats explicitly for the batch norm case without going to cherry picking variable with regex.

body:
I meant:
> you can specify exactly what variables to warm-start, and include the accumulators and moving stats explicitly

So I think that you can have a new parameter to recover accumulators and moving stats explicitly for the batch norm case without going to cherry picking variable with regex.
